title: On Quality by Robert M. Pirsig - Commentary #5   Part 1: Quality
description: My favorite section of this book are the seminal notes Bob made in the psychiatric hospital. The seeds of the MoQ. Just like going back on the language tree to the source, I feel these aphorisms are the source of what we love about Pirsig's work.
